structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.text: The unification review commission shall hold at least one (1) public hearing prior to finalizing its plan to combine county government with one (1) or more cities within the county into a unified local government. The commission may hold additional public hearings as determined by the commission. Notice setting forth the time, date, location, and purpose of the public hearing shall be published as required by KRS Chapter 424.
law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 246, sec. 8, effective July 12, 2006.
